name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
desc: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

desc.text:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=#ffd780>Nereid's Ascension</color> , the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> .
This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
· <color=#ffd780>Kurage's Oath</color> Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
· <color=#ffd780>Nereid's Ascension</color> Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

summaryList.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas

desc.text:
Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Nereid's Ascension</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=#ffd780>Nereid's Ascension</color> , Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.
This effect can occur once every 0.2s.

summaryList.name: All Streams Flow to the Sea

desc.text:
Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Kurage's Oath</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=#ffd780>Nereid's Ascension</color> , Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> for 4s when her Normal and Charged Attacks heal, or would heal, any party member with 80% or more HP.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Sango Pearl
materials.desc: A precious pearl that grows in the coral of Watatsumi. Gives off a cool sheen like that of the moonlight.

materials.name: Spectral Husk
materials.desc:
An energy core that allows the Specters to float. It contains a small amount of elemental energy.
Most of the rest has already dispersed.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

materials.name: Dew of Repudiation
materials.desc:
A strange water droplet left behind by the collapse of the Hydro Hypostasis.
It has strong rejection properties, and this forms the basis of one of the Hydro Hypostasis' attack patterns as well. They say that water contains memories and willpower, and that these things can grow when bodies of water meld together. However, the waves conjured by the Hydro Hypostasis are incompatible with the currents that flow above and below ground. Even if it were to flow into the surpassingly pure waters of Petrichor, this drop of water will likely resist assimilation as strongly as mercury.

"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

materials.name: Spectral Nucleus
materials.desc:
A complete energy core that can sometimes be found after defeating Specters.
There is a debate among those who just have to divide the world into winners and losers: what floats better — a Specter or an Anemo Slime?

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

It has strong rejection properties, and this forms the basis of one of the Hydro Hypostasis' attack patterns as well. However, the waves conjured by the Hydro Hypostasis are incompatible with the currents that flow above and below ground. imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Sparkling Coralbone
Sangonomiya Kokomi's outfit. A noble's dress decorated with little precious objects produced in Watatsumi Island.

voice.title: Chat: Reading
voice.desc: Yae Publishing House has released numerous works that lay out military strategy in a simple and pragmatic way. Those are my favorite.

voice.title: Chat: Fish
voice.desc: Respect must be given to the will of every creature. Each fish in the ocean swims in its own direction.

voice.title: Chat: Preparation
voice.desc: To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: I am Sangonomiya Kokomi, the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. My journey with you will be an opportunity to unwind... Ahem, I mean... to survey beyond our borders. Don't worry, I've left behind ample directives in my absence, and have also completed the island's projected development plans. Departing for a brief period will be of little consequence.

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: Marching in the rain conceals the sound of our arrival, but is also a test of stamina...

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: The snow... have you ever seen such beauty?

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: Such fortunate weather... Care for a walk?

voice.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
voice.desc: Mm... High winds. An incendiary attack would be particularly effective.

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Good morning. I've just read a fascinating stratagem, would you like to study it together?

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: Mmmm... to improve efficiency, we must make some adjustments to our battle plan for the afternoon.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Mm? Night already? Time seems to slip away when I'm with you.

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Good night. Garner your strength for the battles ahead.

voice.title: About Sangonomiya Kokomi: Directives
voice.desc: The battlefield is unpredictable — one false move could mark utter defeat. Before the onset of battle, I bring every possible scenario into consideration, and turn my thoughts into written directives. These are then issued to the troops. ...It does seem at present like they're somewhat over-reliant on the directives, which worries me... If they read up on military strategy themselves, they could begin to rely on their own ability to read the battlefield. I need them to be able to identify and seize opportunities in the heat of the moment.

voice.title: About Sangonomiya Kokomi: Relaxing
voice.desc: Mm... I hope we can put an end to this battle quickly. The Yae Publishing House has just released a new volume of "A Legend of Sword." Ah, I'd like nothing more than to curl up with a copy in my room and read it front to back.

voice.title: About Us: Experience
voice.desc: My mother once taught me that it takes a broad outlook to become a qualified leader. However, my younger years were mostly spent traveling between Sangonomiya and the army. I never had time to embark on my own adventure. So... there are many aspects of adventuring that I've yet to fully understand. Mm, you'll have to excuse my lack of experience in this area.

voice.title: About Us: Confusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

It's said that the depths of a person's heart run deep indeed. Yet, as the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island, it is my duty to strive to understand each person's thoughts. Let's start with you, Traveler. What are you thinking about now? Let me take a guess...

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

In my book, Visions are symbols of aspiration, and aspiration is a precious thing indeed. This is exactly why the resistance was formed — to oppose the Vision Hunt Decree. Aspiration should never be abandoned or forcibly taken away.

voice.title: Something to Share: Periodicals
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Among Yae Publishing House's various publications, my personal favorite is the "Teyvat Art of War." See, it has articles on classic military campaigns, as well as detailed analysis and commentary from famous strategists. There are a few that I particularly enjoy... Here, let me read them to you.

voice.title: Something to Share: Diving
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

The world below water is not bright and sunny like that of dry land. Still, whenever I lend myself to the deep, my heart gradually fills with a permeating sense of peace. Fish move in faraway shoals, jellyfish dance around me, and my troubles start to simply wash away. Mmm... I could take you to see it sometime, what do you think?

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: I simply love Watatsumi Coral Pearls... They're not just a source of income for Watatsumi Island, but a gift from the sea itself.

voice.title: About Gorou
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Gorou is an exceptional general... sincere, determined, and courageous. He has a strong camaraderie with the troops and is able to come up with creative battle plans. He does, however, have one shortcoming... He often lets the excitement of battle get to his head. If you are ever deployed to the battlefield together, be sure to have a good rein on him when things get underway.

voice.title: About Kujou Sara
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Mmm... I must admit, Kujou Sara is an opponent that cannot be taken lightly. She seldom employs cunning strategy, but her performance in open warfare is always admirable. The Shogun's Army places great trust in her abilities — they are united and ready to fight valiantly under her command, even to the death. Her forces have been a serious threat to the resistance on multiple occasions.

voice.title: About Yae Miko
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I have also heard of Guuji Yae's great deeds. In all fairness, I hold her to be an outstanding shrine maiden, and she has performed her duties marvelously. I even heard that she holds responsibility where Yae Publishing House's light novels are concerned. An enigmatic individual to say the least...

voice.title: About the Raiden Shogun
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Omnipresence Over Mortals"

Now that the Vision Hunt Decree is over, Watatsumi Island has once again returned to normal life. It has never been my intent to scrutinize the rights and wrongs of the Shogun's actions, even to this day. What I do care about is the future of our island. It is my hope that the Shogun will fulfill her promise and that we can live with the Shogunate in peace. However, if there comes a day when she once again casts aside the aspirations of the people, I can assure you that we won't sit by and watch.

voice.title: About Beidou
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Omnipresence Over Mortals"

Ah... back when Beidou and I were carrying out ambushes against the Shogun's Army together, I raised my concerns that the enemy might detect our approach. But Beidou assured me of her fleet's unwavering discipline, and that raids could be carried out without detection. In the end, she was right, and that's exactly what happened. Now, every time the Watatsumi fleet encounters some sort of bottleneck, I consider inviting her to come and give them her instruction. There's no doubt, she runs a tight ship...

voice.title: About Kaedehara Kazuha
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Omniprence Over Mortals"

Kazuha once came and bunked with the resistance for a time. If I'm not mistaken, he got along very well with Gorou — they would often fight side-by-side in battle. Kazuha has a carefree personality and doesn't like constraints, but he would follow every command to the letter when he was among our ranks. In my opinion, not only is he an outstanding swordsman, but a very refined character.

voice.title: About Shikanoin Heizou
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Initially, I was astonished to see anyone coming to Watatsumi Island wearing a Tenryou Commission uniform. A Tenryou Commission samurai would never be that brazen, and a Tenryou Commission spy would never be that conspicuous. Shortly after, I discovered that he was a self-proclaimed "detective" by the name of Shikanoin, and that he took no interest in military, government, or commercial affairs. Instead, he seemed to have arrived for a bit of sightseeing. As such, I set a few eyes on him, but refrained from taking any action to remove him from the island. Be sure to talk to him if the chance ever presents itself.

voice.title: More About Sangonomiya Kokomi: I
voice.desc: No matter how pressing the situation may become, I must remain composed. If I let the stress get to me, then what can I expect from others around me?

voice.title: More About Sangonomiya Kokomi: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

Legend has it that our ancestors lived in a palace in the depths of the ocean, and that the god, Orobashi, brought us to the surface. I've often wondered, wouldn't a palace like that be too dark? Every time I think about it, I start to really appreciate the light...

voice.title: More About Sangonomiya Kokomi: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Omniprence Over Mortals"

After you left, the soldiers of Swordfish II nominated a temporary captain, but everyone was hoping that you'd return. I could only tell them that you'd been tasked with an important solo mission. If you get the chance, you should go visit them, I'm sure they'd love to see you.

voice.title: More About Sangonomiya Kokomi: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

A long time ago, I had no intention of becoming the Divine Priestess. My only goal was to study military strategy and become an adviser. That way, I could remain behind the scenes and lessen my overall burden. *sigh* Fate had other ideas in store... You can't defy that which flows in your veins.

voice.title: More About Sangonomiya Kokomi: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

After becoming the Divine Priestess, I gradually grew accustomed to this life. At the very least, I have the power to change something when it doesn't sit well with me. More importantly, this title allowed me to meet you, did it not?

voice.title: Sangonomiya Kokomi's Hobbies
voice.desc: Huh? What do I enjoy? Simple. I like to find a quiet place by myself and read books on strategy... Ahh, the whole day, without interruption. I'd be even happier if we looked over some of it together. One thing though... You'd have to sleep on the floor.

voice.title: Sangonomiya Kokomi's Troubles
voice.desc:
Complete "Warriors' Dreams Like Spring Grass Renewing"

To be quite honest, I'm not particularly skilled at communicating with others. Putting on my "Divine Priestess airs" certainly makes things easier, but once I run out of energy, I start to get a bit negative. I prevent others from seeing that side of me at all costs. The people of Watatsumi Island need a perfect leader, not some girl who likes to wile away her time at home.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: I just love eating Bird Egg Sushi. The ingredients are easy to find, and it's simple to prepare... Ah... perfect for military life. Sitting down to eat Bird Egg Sushi in the midst of war might seem a bit extravagant, but in most cases, simple food like this brings great satisfaction to the soldiers.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: Mm... If I had to say, I'm not fond of any sort of seafood. But please, keep this strictly confidential. The fishing industry is essential to Watatsumi Island, and if word were to get out that seafood wasn't my thing, I'm afraid morale would be gravely affected.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Yummy, this is delicious! And it seems my energy is also... Ahem, I mean... Never mind...

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: I like to take my time and eat slowly, that way I can enjoy it for longer.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Oh, it seems we are at an impasse.

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Happy birthday! So, what are your plans for the day? Oh, why don't we celebrate on Watatsumi Island? First, I'll take you out at daybreak to see the sunrise, then we can go diving during the heat of the day. In the evening, we can go for a stroll around Sangonomiya Shrine. If it rains, we'll find somewhere cozy to hide out with a few strategy books, and try to bake a cake together! In any case, no need to plan anything, the grand strategist has everything thought out for you!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 1

Brute force is not my modus operandi. But becoming stronger isn't a bad thing.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 2

I'm just bubbling with energy... We'll make a formidable force in our next fight.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 4

The moon shines bright over the depths of the seas as the tides come and go. It seems that as I go from strength to strength, so does my state of mind flow.

voice.title: Feelings about Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 6

I often used to succumb to self-doubt. I would think to myself, "Can a person like me really hold the title of Divine Priestess?" Now, the thought hardly crosses my mind. When I'm with you, I seem to be able to cut straight through most problems.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Allow me!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Hold the line.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Rest and rebuild.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Covenant of the Deep.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Billowing surge!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Torrents, bring refuge!

voice.title: Sprint Start: I
voice.desc: Let's move out.

voice.title: Deploying Wind Glider: I
voice.desc: Breathtaking.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: Provisions are vital.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: We should make the most of these supplies.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Mm... So this is the thrill of adventure...

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Fatigue is setting in...

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Time to switch tactics.

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: Foresight brings victory.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: Reinforcements have arrived!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Fall back.

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: New strategy needed...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: A lapse in judgment...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Must learn from my mistakes...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: A brash maneuver!

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: II
voice.desc: Uphill battle...

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: We'll need a strategy...

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Take heart, victory will be ours.

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: All is accounted for, let's move out.

value.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi: The Deep
value.desc:
Namecard style.
All Watatsumi islanders know this tale: that deep beneath the waves lies their former home.

value.name: A Stunning Stratagem
value.desc: Sangonomiya Kokomi's specialty. The egg is wrapped up almost like a package, and the fish tail at the end is both small and very cute. It really makes you wonder what's inside the package, but at the same time, you can't bear to eat such a beautiful-looking thing... You glance at the crystal-clear smile in Kokomi's eyes. Ah, darn it, you've fallen for her trick, haven't you?

value.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
value.desc:
"Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 3 consecutive attacks that take the form of swimming fish, dealing <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <color=#80c0ff>AoE Hydro DMG</color> after a short casting time.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Hydro, Kokomi plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#80c0ff>AoE Hydro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Transience
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
Fleeting glories are the highest expression of mortal beauty, for are we mortals not like the flashing lightning itself? Like a lovely dream or blossoming spark, we shall leave a gorgeous mark on the eternal night sky.

materials.name: Spectral Husk
materials.desc:
An energy core that allows the Specters to float. It contains a small amount of elemental energy.
Most of the rest has already dispersed.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Transience
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
We find the greatest joys in mortal life in transient dreams, for is life itself not like the shadow of the thunder? Pursue your dreams into the clouds if you wish, and enjoy the unexpected silence of the dim lamp-lit nights.

materials.name: Spectral Heart
materials.desc:
An energy core that allows the Specters to float.
These elemental life-forms have strange behavioral patterns and will periodically surge in number before disappearing.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Spectral Heart
materials.desc:
An energy core that allows the Specters to float.
These elemental life-forms have strange behavioral patterns and will periodically surge in number before disappearing.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Transience
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?

materials.name: Spectral Nucleus
materials.desc:
A complete energy core that can sometimes be found after defeating Specters.
There is a debate among those who just have to divide the world into winners and losers: what floats better — a Specter or an Anemo Slime?

materials.name: Hellfire Butterfly
materials.desc:
A warped shard that houses great might. You obtained this from defeating Signora, who unleashed her original power.
The seal of ice was broken under duress, and as her former will surged forth from its pale white prison and she remembered her old name once more, the undying butterfly danced amidst burning flesh and blood. And she remembered her past, wandering the land, spreading the flame, burning away all evil — and she recalled the face of the person she could never meet again.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Transience
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?

materials.name: Spectral Nucleus
materials.desc:
A complete energy core that can sometimes be found after defeating Specters.
There is a debate among those who just have to divide the world into winners and losers: what floats better — a Specter or an Anemo Slime?

materials.name: Hellfire Butterfly
materials.desc:
A warped shard that houses great might. You obtained this from defeating Signora, who unleashed her original power.
The seal of ice was broken under duress, and as her former will surged forth from its pale white prison and she remembered her old name once more, the undying butterfly danced amidst burning flesh and blood. And she remembered her past, wandering the land, spreading the flame, burning away all evil — and she recalled the face of the person she could never meet again.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Transience
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?

materials.name: Spectral Nucleus
materials.desc:
A complete energy core that can sometimes be found after defeating Specters.
There is a debate among those who just have to divide the world into winners and losers: what floats better — a Specter or an Anemo Slime?

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Summons a "Bake-Kurage" created from water that can heal her allies.
Using this skill will apply the <color=#80c0ff>Wet</color> status to Sangonomiya Kokomi.
<color=#ffd780>Bake-Kurage</color>
Deals <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> to surrounding opponents and heals nearby active characters at fixed intervals. This healing is based on Kokomi's Max HP.
Kokomi needs timely "refreshment" in order to maintain optimal work efficiency .

Summons the might of Watatsumi, dealing <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> to surrounding opponents, before robing Kokomi in a Ceremonial Garment made from the flowing waters of Sangonomiya.
<color=#ffd780>Ceremonial Garment</color>
· Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack, Charged Attack and Bake-Kurage DMG are increased based on her Max HP.
· When her Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents, Kokomi will restore HP for all nearby party members, and the amount restored is based on her Max HP.
· Increases Sangonomiya Kokomi's resistance to interruption and allows her to walk on the water's surface.
These effects will be cleared once Sangonomiya Kokomi leaves the field.
Clear light coalesces into robes around Her Excellency, Sangonomiya Kokomi, reflecting her magnificent form.
If Sangonomiya Kokomi's own Bake-Kurage is on the field when she uses <color=#ffd780>Nereid's Ascension</color> , the Bake-Kurage's duration will be refreshed.

While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=#ffd780>Nereid's Ascension</color> , the Normal and Charged Attack DMG Bonus Sangonomiya Kokomi gains based on her Max HP will receive a further increase based on 15% of her Healing Bonus.

Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.
Sangonomiya Kokomi has a 25% Healing Bonus, but a 100% decrease in CRIT Rate.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>July 22, 2021</color>
"Her Excellency, Sangonomiya, is an astute strategist. She can accurately predict enemy movements from thousands of miles of way."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/587411</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 15, 2021</color>
"To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship." — "Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/903857</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 15, 2021</color>
"Battlefield situations are always developing rapidly. Quick thinking and adaptability are key to winning consistently."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/904345</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 22, 2022</color>
Traveler, welcome back to Watatsumi Island.
Since early this morning, everyone has been sending me birthday wishes.
I smiled and thanked each of them one by one. It makes me very happy to be able to feel everyone's affections and trust.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/3481080</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 22, 2022</color>
"In my spare time, I enjoy taking a walk on the beach by myself like this to clear my mind. I'm very happy to have your company today."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/3481081</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 22, 2023</color>
As the leader of Watatsumi Island, it's been a long time since I've led my people in moving forward against the current.
Your efforts are essential to the peace and harmony we now enjoy.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/16534362</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 22, 2023</color>
"Your Excellency! Please rest well today. We'll take care of everything!"
"So all of you... I see, thank you very much."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/16534363</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 22, 2024</color>
"I can sense everyone's good will towards me~ I feel blessed, even if I've completely run out of 'energy.' I guess I'll spend this evening reading some new military strategy books to recuperate..."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/25423598</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 22, 2024</color>
Swimming in clear waters among glistening shoals of fish, feeling the gentle caress of the ocean... it has a calming effect on your mind.
I've read much about the world beneath the waves of Fontaine in books. It's said to be a mysterious place full of unknown treasures.
I've always wondered, though, if it's any different from the waters of Watatsumi Island — and if so, how exactly... Given how much of the world you've seen, you wouldn't be able to tell me more about it, would you?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/25423599</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 22, 2025</color>
"The scenery of Watatsumi Island is pure and beautiful. Taking a stroll like this on the island, away from all disputes, is such a pleasant experience."
"Of course, this is all based on the premise that the people of Watatsumi Island live far from conflict and in happiness."
"Ah, I'm starting to think about these things again... Just relax now, it's only a stroll, let me clear my mind."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/37225916</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 22, 2025</color>
The strange and fantastical world depicted in this book is truly captivating.
That said, having a day off without being disturbed by the tedium of official duties — leaves me free to browse through some supernatural novels while enjoying this view of the shimmering waves. It's quite a pleasant way of life indeed...
On that note, how has adventuring been treating you these days? Are your stories as plentiful and exciting as the ones in this book?
Since I've got today all to myself, why not regale me with some stories of your own? Look, even this little one's gotten all curious.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/37225917</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 8, 2022</color>
"Such fortunate weather... Care for a walk?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/3714054</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 6, 2023</color>
Click image to view full wallpaper
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/22139752</color>

Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color> summons a " <color=#ffd780>Bake-Kurage</color> " that provides <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> to the active character(s) at fixed intervals
This <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> scales off Kokomi's max <color=#ffd780>HP</color>
The " <color=#ffd780>Bake-Kurage</color> " also deals <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> to nearby opponents at fixed intervals
Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color> summons her <color=#ffd780>Ceremonial Garment</color> ,which has the following effects:
Increases the <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> output of all <color=#ffd780>ATKs</color> based on her max <color=#ffd780>HP</color>
<color=#ffd780>Normal/Charged ATKs</color> provide <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> to party members, scaling off max <color=#ffd780>HP</color>
Kokomi has a base of +25% <color=#ffd780>Healing Bonus</color> at the cost of -100% <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color>

customize.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
customize.desc: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
401
<color=#ffffff>HP</color>
35.2%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Wish
Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers provides Kokomi with an <color=#ffd780>HP</color> boost, which will increase her <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> and personal <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> . When the active party member is switched from Kokomi to another character, this weapon also provides an ATK boost to the new character.

customize.name: Magic Guide
customize.desc: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
354
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Mastery</color>
187
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Wish
Magic Guide provides Kokomi with <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> , making it ideal for a team utilizing <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reactions</color> . Furthermore, since Kokomi is a <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> character, she can utilize the weapons passive to increase her <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> against opponents.

customize.name: Prototype Amber
customize.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
510
<color=#ffffff>HP</color>
41.3%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Craftable
Prototype Amber is the only 4-star weapon with an <color=#ffd780>HP</color> substat. The bonus <color=#ffd780>HP</color> increases Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> and personal <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> , and the weapon's passive will further heal the party when Kokomi uses her <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color> .

customize.name: Hakushin Ring
customize.desc: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
565
<color=#ffffff>Energy Recharge</color>
30.6%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Craftable
Hakushin Ring provides Kokomi with <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> to burst more easily. Its passive increases <color=#ffd780>Elemental DMG Bonus</color> when an <color=#ffacff>Electro Reaction</color> is triggered. Therefore, this weapon can be best used on a team that can trigger <color=#ffacff>Electro-Charged</color> or <color=#99ff88>Hyperbloom Reactions</color> .

customize.name: Fruit of Fulfillment
customize.desc: It holds the potential to conquer any crisis.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
510
<color=#ffffff>Energy Recharge</color>
45.9%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Craftable
Fruit of Fulfillment provides Kokomi with <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> , while its passive increases her <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> when an <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reaction</color> is triggered. The weapon's passive also decreases Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> , but since Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> scales with her <color=#ffd780>HP</color> , this is of little consequence.

customize.name: Sacrificial Fragments
customize.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
454
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Mastery</color>
221
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Wish
Sacrificial Fragments provides Kokomi with <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> , making it ideal for a team utilizing <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reactions</color> . Furthermore, since Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color> applies multiple instances of <color=#ffd780>Ripple DMG</color> , she can easily trigger the weapon's passive to reset her <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill CD</color> .

customize.name: Mappa Mare
customize.desc: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
565
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Mastery</color>
110
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Craftable
Mappa Mare provides Kokomi with <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> , making it ideal for a team utilizing <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reactions</color> . Its passive increases Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Elemental DMG</color> when she triggers an <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reaction</color> .

customize.name: Everlasting Moonglow
customize.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
608
<color=#ffffff>HP</color>
49.6%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Wish
Everlasting Moonglow is Kokomi's signature weapon, and it provides her with the highest <color=#ffd780>HP</color> bonus. Its passive further increases her <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> and personal <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> , while also providing some <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> .

customize.name: Jadefall's Splendor
customize.desc: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
608
<color=#ffffff>HP</color>
49.6%
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Wish
Jadefall's Splendor provides Kokomi with the same stats as Everlasting Moonglow. However, its passive is more restrictive since it can only be activated when Kokomi uses her <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color> . Furthermore, it only provides <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> and <color=#ffd780>Elemental DMG Bonus</color> , which can be beneficial to increase Kokomi's personal <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> but does little to increase her <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> .

customize.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
customize.desc: The lamp illuminates the dreams that float up over a thousand nights, and in its emerald-green light flows a song of ancient days.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Base ATK</color>
542
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Mastery</color>
265
<color=#ffffff>Source</color>
Wish
A Thousand Floating Dreams provides Kokomi with <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> , making it ideal for a team utilizing <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reactions</color> . Depending on the composition of her team, the weapon's passive can further increase Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> and/or <color=#ffd780>Elemental DMG Bonus</color> .

The Tenacity of the Millelith set provides Kokomi with <color=#ffd780>HP</color> to increase her <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> and personal <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> . Since Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color> applies multiple instances of <color=#ffd780>Ripple DMG</color> over time, it is easy for her to activate the 4-piece bonus to boost the <color=#ffd780>ATK/Shield Strength</color> of her party.

<color=#ffd780>Healing Effectiveness</color> +15%
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill/Burst</color> increases <color=#ffd780>Healing</color>
The Maiden Beloved set optimizes Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> .

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus</color>
<color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> +15%
Decreases opponents' <color=#99ff88>Dendro RES</color>
Although Kokomi does not benefit from the 2-piece <color=#ffd780>Deepwood Memories</color> bonus, she can use 4-piece bonus to support a team with <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> dealers.

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> +80
Increases <color=#ffd780>Bloom DMG</color>
Flower of Paradise Lost is an offensive set that optimizes Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Bloom DMG</color> rather than her <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> . It should be noted that the 4-piece bonus can only be triggered if Kokomi is the one triggering the <color=#ffd780>Bloom Reactions</color> .

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> +80
Reactions increase <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery/ATK</color>
Gilded Dreams is an offensive set that optimizes Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reaction DMG</color> rather than her <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> . Depending on the composition of her team, when Kokomi triggers an Elemental Reaction, she can gain further <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> and/or <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> bonuses.

<color=#ffd780>Healing Effectiveness</color> +15%
<color=#ffd780>HP</color> +20%
These 2-piece/2-piece combinations work together to increase Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> +80

These 2-piece/2-piece combinations work together to increase Kokomi's <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reaction DMG</color> and personal <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> .

Kokomi is the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island, and also serves as its supreme leader.
She is well-versed in the art of war, is good at strategizing, and has keen insights into military affairs. She is also adept at handling domestic affairs, diplomacy, and other matters.
Still, this unfathomable leader has a mysterious side to her...
<color=#ffffff>Sangonomiya Kokomi - Pearl of Wisdom</color>
Sangonomiya Kokomi is the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island, and is the highly-skilled strategist of the resistance forces.
"Things will be alright as long as Her Excellency is here," is what the people of Watatsumi say, and it is a great comfort to them all.
This young lady is at great pains to meet such expectations and also manage Watatsumi Island's affairs at the same time.
It is only in little moments of stolen leisure that she can lay down her duties as a "shrine maiden" and read some books that "Kokomi" enjoys.

customize.name: Gorou
customize.desc: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Gorou</color>
Gorou is an exceptional general... sincere, determined, and courageous. He has a strong camaraderie with the troops and is able to come up with creative battle plans. He does, however, have one shortcoming... He often lets the excitement of battle get to his head. If you are ever deployed to the battlefield together, be sure to have a good rein on him when things get underway.
<color=#ffd780>About Sangonomiya Kokomi: Duties</color>
As the leader of Watatsumi Island, Her Excellency is responsible for assessing the scenario and formulating a plan. It is then my duty to put every detail of the plan into action and to keep the situation under control on the front line. We are united with the whole resistance in achieving a single purpose: victory.
<color=#ffd780>About Sangonomiya Kokomi: Attitude</color>
I have only the utmost respect for Her Excellency. Without her ingenious and insightful strategies, the resistance could never have come as far as it has today. But if you ask me, it seems that deep down she prefers a much quieter existence. So when there's no pressing military matters, I try not to disturb her too much.
<color=#ffd780>More About Gorou: IV</color>
Her Excellency once warned me of my fatal flaw... I tend to get too engrossed in battle, fighting deep into enemy lines and forgetting about everything else. She told me that my bravery is commendable, but as a ranking officer, it's not my place to do this. I'm doing my best to improve, but... Would you also be able to keep an eye on me?

customize.name: Gorou
customize.desc: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

customize.text:
Character Story 1
Character Story 2
Character Story 3

customize.name: Kujou Sara
customize.desc: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Kujou Sara</color>
Mmm... I must admit, Kujou Sara is an opponent that cannot be taken lightly. She seldom employs cunning strategy, but her performance in open warfare is always admirable. The Shogun's Army places great trust in her abilities — they are united and ready to fight valiantly under her command, even to the death. Her forces have been a serious threat to the resistance on multiple occasions.
<color=#ffd780>About Sangonomiya Kokomi</color>
She is more proficient as a military strategist than a priestess. The way she uses directives to wage war is almost unheard of. I wonder if I should adopt this technique for commanding the Shogun's Army? Hmm... but this could lead us to a situation whereby war is waged at the negotiation table, each side with their pack of strategy cards, playing them one by one until a victor emerges... Then again, perhaps not.

customize.name: Yae Miko
customize.desc: Lady Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Also serves as the editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House. Unimaginable intelligence and cunning are hidden under her beautiful appearance.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Yae Miko</color>
I have also heard of Guuji Yae's great deeds. In all fairness, I hold her to be an outstanding shrine maiden, and she has performed her duties marvelously. I even heard that she holds responsibility where Yae Publishing House's light novels are concerned. An enigmatic individual to say the least...
<color=#ffd780>About Sangonomiya Kokomi</color>
These Divine Priestesses seem to be getting cuter every generation. I wonder how she looks performing the Dance of Divine Peace... Perhaps even little schools of fish swish around her while she spins. If she's ever looking for a more experienced head shrine maiden to learn from, I'd be quite happy to share a few tips with her... Hehe, as long as she asked me nicely, of course.

<color=#ffd780>About Raiden Shogun</color>
Now that the Vision Hunt Decree is over, Watatsumi Island has once again returned to normal life. It has never been my intent to scrutinize the rights and wrongs of the Shogun's actions, even to this day. What I do care about is the future of our island. It is my hope that the Shogun will fulfill her promise and that we can live with the Shogunate in peace. However, if there comes a day when she once again casts aside the aspirations of the people, I can assure you that we won't sit by and watch.
<color=#ffd780>About Sangonomiya Kokomi</color>
Indeed. It was I who slew Orobaxi. But I also allowed the people of Sangonomiya to continue worshiping it as the Watatsumi Omikami, so that it might enjoy their offerings. Now, Sangonomiya has destroyed the local Narukami Shrine and rebels against the Shogunate. As the Divine Priestess representing the Watatsumi Omikami, she must be held accountable.

customize.name: Beidou
customize.desc: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Beidou</color>
Ah... back when Beidou and I were carrying out ambushes against the Shogun's Army together, I raised my concerns that the enemy might detect our approach. But Beidou assured me of her fleet's unwavering discipline, and that raids could be carried out without detection. In the end, she was right, and that's exactly what happened. Now, every time the Watatsumi fleet encounters some sort of bottleneck, I consider inviting her to come and give them her instruction. There's no doubt, she runs a tight ship...

customize.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
customize.desc: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Kaedehara Kazuha</color>
Kazuha once came and bunked with the resistance for a time. If I'm not mistaken, he got along very well with Gorou — they would often fight side-by-side in battle. Kazuha has a carefree personality and doesn't like constraints, but he would follow every command to the letter when he was among our ranks. In my opinion, not only is he an outstanding swordsman, but a very refined character.
<color=#ffd780>About Sangonomiya Kokomi</color>
<color=#9b9c9f>During my time with the Resistance, there was no one among our ranks who wouldn't look up to Her Excellency. As someone with a great passion for military matters, victory at all costs isn't really part of her ethos. She'd always try to limit the casualties to the minimum while planning her next move. By some accounts, it also seems that she seeks to take charge of both internal and foreign affairs for Watatsumi Island. Wouldn't that be too much to expect of herself though?</color>

customize.name: Shikanoin Heizou
customize.desc: A young prodigy detective from the Tenryou Commission. His senses are sharp and his thoughts are clear.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Shikanoin Heizou</color>
Initially, I was astonished to see anyone coming to Watatsumi Island wearing a Tenryou Commission uniform. A Tenryou Commission samurai would never be that brazen, and a Tenryou Commission spy would never be that conspicuous. Shortly after, I discovered that he was a self-proclaimed "detective" by the name of Shikanoin, and that he took no interest in military, government, or commercial affairs. Instead, he seemed to have arrived for a bit of sightseeing. As such, I set a few eyes on him, but refrained from taking any action to remove him from the island. Be sure to talk to him if the chance ever presents itself.
<color=#ffd780>About Sangonomiya Kokomi</color>
I've actually never seen Madam Sangonomiya before. Whenever she appears, practically the whole village crowds around her... I'm not about to contend with that. Oh, and even if you made it through all the villagers, there'd still be a circle of shrine maidens around her! For one of us young people to gain that kind of recognition from everyone, it must have taken a lot of work.

desc.text:
The inhabitants of Watatsumi Island once lived in Enkanomiya, at the bottom of the sea.
It was only by the grace of the god Orobaxi bringing them up to the surface that the civilization of Watatsumi Island exists today.
When Orobaxi was slain by the Electro Archon, its body was left as a skeleton and its resentment permeated the land, giving rise to Tatarigami.
Yet its desire to protect Watatsumi Island never faded. This will lives on in the bloodline of the Sangonomiya Clan, and follows them from generation to generation.
The current heir to this bloodline is known as the Divine Priestess.
The meaning behind this is as such: to inherit the will of a god in a mortal's body, and to defend this land and its people in that god's stead.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
The day Kokomi ascended to the role of Divine Priestess, countless inhabitants of Watatsumi Island came to Sangonomiya Shrine of their own accord to see her.
Surprise, suspicion, confusion, chuckles... Their expressions were strange, all on account of her overly-young appearance in their eyes.
Plots were hatched and questions were endless. The ambitious planned to make their move. The storm was approaching, and all was not at peace on Watatsumi Island.
Yet all went back to business as usual not long after Kokomi ascended to her position.
She was fair in distributing rewards and punishments alike, appreciated the contributions of the people, and was militarily skilled. Her many abilities quickly won the hearts of most of the people.
"Things will be alright as long as Her Excellency is here" soon became the most widespread saying on the island.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
There are many factors involved in deciding victory or defeat.
Terrain, weather, differences in military strength and equipment quality... All of these require careful consideration.
Those who study the details too closely tend to miss changes on the field, and most who speak of strategy speak of it in a vacuum.
Only those who can grasp both the big picture and the small details can create miracles on the battlefield.
And behind all this lies countless hours of hard work delving into the reasons behind one's failures.
Few if any ever persevere to the end, but Kokomi was not only good at this but also possessed a unique tactical style.
"Manipulate the larger strategic situation to force the other side to give up, and to win wars with the least amount of cost possible."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Whether on the battlefield or off it, Kokomi tries to "know thy enemy" as much as possible.
She tends to predict all possible scenarios beforehand and devise strategies to address them, which are then delivered as directives to those who enforce her will.
This has given rise to the issue of some of these directives being rather thick and heavy, but this method has guaranteed the stable development of Watatsumi Island.
Today, Watatsumi Island moves each day towards greater prosperity, and as more talented people have been appointed to office, the directives that Kokomi has to deliver have decreased.
As far as she is concerned, that is something worth celebrating.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
When Kokomi has the time to spare, she will go on walks on Watatsumi Island alone.
She often tries to avoid crowds, pacing slowly through the violet forests, sometimes sitting by the seaside and looking out into the distance.
The sun and the moon rise over the sea, the stars shine in their skies, and the sound of the waves is pleasing to the ear, relaxing the soul.
Sometimes she will even place a seashell on her head, only to put it back where she found it when she leaves.
In her mind, perhaps some wandering crab will burrow its way inside and call this shell home.
Sometimes, Kokomi will also go diving, enjoying the calm atmosphere by herself, her worries sinking into the ocean depths as schools of fish swim all around her.
Kokomi treasures every sight there is to be seen on Watatsumi Island, and she remembers the name of every person.
Sadly, while scenery remains, people's hearts are complex and changeable.
Victory is simple enough to attain compared to the mammoth task of making sure that everyone lives happily.
This dilemma has always troubled her.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Kokomi has been well-read since she was young, and has a particular love for military treatises.
As such, Kokomi has a broad store of knowledge to be used in every field.
But another result of her constantly being buried in such treatises of war and illustrated military texts is that Kokomi lacks skill in social interaction. She does not know when it started, but interacting with people eventually became tiresome to her.
Having ascended to the role of Divine Priestess, Kokomi had no choice but to learn many things that she wasn't any good at before, whether it was dealing with people or performing duties that she had little interest in.
However, forcing herself to do things she holds little love for is a serious drain on her energy reserves, leaving her feeling quite exhausted.
As such, Kokomi set up an "energy" system of measurement for herself. When she does things she enjoys, her energy levels will increase, and the reverse is true when she trudges through unenjoyable slogs.
When she runs out of this energy, Kokomi will temporarily put her duties as the Divine Priestess aside and resume being an ordinary homebody.
Engrossing herself in the close reading of a book on military strategy, walling herself off from the rest of the world — thus does Kokomi reclaim a temporary respite from her busy existence.
These moments are of utmost value to her.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
"As the ruler is, so shall the people be."
This precept was something Kokomi heard from her mother a long time ago.
The Divine Priestess' role is one of utmost importance to Watatsumi Island, and its people's eyes are always upon her every move.
The things she loves will be in fashion, and the things she dislikes, the people will also distance themselves from.
Kokomi, in truth, has no wish to affect the people's lives, and as such has rarely ever revealed much of her personal likes or dislikes.
She treats all things with an egalitarian manner, and holds "fairness of judgment" and "justice in dispensing rewards and punishment" to be her guiding principles.
However, these are not necessarily her true feelings, and so she prepared a book of secret notes for herself.
Here, she records the fluctuations in both her energy levels and mood.
When the night deepens and the world falls silent, Kokomi will open this book and write the day's experiences, whether they be joyous, sad, or frustrating.
...Of course, this object is for her eyes only — and so it must remain.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
A leader with a strong will can lead those around them in a clear direction.
However, Kokomi lacks such strong ideals. Instead, she respects the will of the people and wishes that they can each find their own way.
Just as the vast ocean can accommodate countless souls and their individual desires, so does Kokomi wish her rule could be.
When the Vision Hunt Decree came about, the resentment of the people turned into cries of revolt, and so Kokomi led them in raising the banner of resistance.
And once the war was over, the hearts of the people turned towards peace and stability, and so did Kokomi direct her energies towards governance and economics.
But what was the source of this toil? Was this the role of the Divine Priestess speaking? Or was this a product of her own sense of duty? Or perhaps... it was a bit of both?
As the Divine Priestess, Kokomi naturally has her own Vision. And ever since the day she looked out at the sea outside Sangonomiya Shrine, her wish has never once changed—
"I wish to protect all of Watatsumi Island and allow its people to lead happy lives."
